titleStmt.title: Bishop Cozens's argument, proving, that adultery works a dissolution of the marriage. Being the substance of several of Bishop Cozens his speeches in the House of Lords, upon the debate of Lord Ross's case. Taken from original papers writ in the Bishop's own hand.
titleStmt.author: Cosin, John, 1594-1672.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Jer. Wilkins, near Fleet-street,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
With: The Duke of Norfolk's case: with reasons for passing his bill.
